paragraphs: The Astronomer's command over these stars are great, but he did not come upon this power naturally. We now know that he was given this ability, along with a seemingly endless lifespan. How this power was given or what exactly it is, well, we're not sure. But we know how to find out.

Now is the time to strike, while his control over the Planisphere wanes. Luck could not be more on our sides, or perhaps our Mistress has given us more aid than I first believed. No matter. We all know the value of acting quickly, before the opportunity is lost.
